clio_api.notes: Clio API integration guidance for auto-generated OpenAPI clients.

quirks.title: Fields Parameter Required for Nested Objects
quirks.description: Nested fields like 'matter.display_number' or 'assignee.name' must be explicitly included in the 'fields' query parameter.

quirks.title: ETag Required for Updates
quirks.description: Use the 'If-Match' header with the current ETag when updating any resource to avoid 412 errors.

quirks.title: Use Structured Payload for Updates
quirks.description: Use Pydantic models like 'TaskUpdateRequest' instead of raw JSON/dict when calling OpenAPI-generated update methods.

quirks.title: Common Errors
quirks.description: 400 HTML responses typically mean malformed requests. 422 indicates a semantic error like wrong enum or type for a query param.

best_practices: Always use the correct OpenAPI model wrappers for request payloads.
Use Clio's field projection syntax for nested fields.
Strip quotes from etag headers when copying from API responses.
Default to using Clio's latest API version unless otherwise required.
